nodes.text: A shovel was a tool used for digging, though it could also double as an effective improvised weapon.
When confronting Pax Maripher and Rahara Wick on Pijal's moon, Qui-Gon Jinn told Maripher to stand down after it became evident that Maripher was holding a shovel and not a blaster.
Jyn Erso once used a shovel as a weapon to attack the Rebel extraction team led by Sergeant Ruescott Melshi sent to retrieve her from Wobani, breaking Melshi's nose in the process.
